function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevalence of SARS-CoV-2 in air conditioning systems","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus through air conditioning systems","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of air conditioning systems, implementation of air purification technologies, and monitoring of air quality","Technologies":"Air purification systems, HVAC filters, air quality monitoring sensors","People":"Occupants of public schools, hospitals, shopping malls, mosques, and public places","Owner":"Facility management, healthcare providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Heat stress in non-air-conditioned places","Impact":"Reduction in activity, health, and immunity of occupants, leading to reduced resistance to infection","Mitigation":"Implementation of cooling measures, provision of shaded areas, and hydration stations","Technologies":"Cooling systems, shade structures, water dispensers","People":"Occupants of non-air-conditioned places","Owner":"Local authorities, building owners, community organizations"},{"Description":"Controversy regarding air as a vector for COVID-19","Impact":"Confusion and uncertainty about the role of air conditioning systems in the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Dissemination of accurate information, education on air quality, and public health measures","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, educational materials, air quality monitoring devices","People":"General public, occupants of air-conditioned spaces","Owner":"Public health agencies, educational institutions, public information providers"}]}
